Package com.yantra.yfs.japi.util

Provides miscellaneous platform utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    YFSAuthenticator
    This interface needs to be implemented only if a custom authentication mechanism is required within the application.
    YFSAuthenticatorEx
    This interface needs to be implemented only if a custom authentication mechanism is required within the application.
    YFSClientIPReader
    This interface needs to be implemented only if a custom mechanism is required to read the cleint IP address from the HTTP request.
    YFSEventHandlerEx
    This interface replaces previous YFSEventHandler interface.
    YFSSingleSignonManager
    This interface needs to be implemented only if a single signon mechanism is required within the application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    YFSInitializer  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    YFSUseInternalAuthException
    This exception may be thrown by YFSAuthenticator or YFSAuthenticatorEx to indicate that internal authentication of the user should be performed instead.

Package com.yantra.yfs.japi.util Description

Provides miscellaneous platform utilities.
